title: Ep. 85: 'The Andy Greenwald Podcast' With Christopher Cantwell and Christopher C. Rogers
description:
'Halt and Catch Fire' showrunners Christopher Cantwell and Christopher C. Rogers join Andy Greenwald to discuss the show's brilliant third season and its bold play for the future.

Note: This interview was conducted before 'Halt and Catch Fire' was renewed for a fourth and final season by AMC.
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
